title: (x) Coldwell Banker logo - similar to BD Bankwell, ITC Berkeley Oldstyle {Raph, Angel}
content:
Turning to the experts again, please and thank you ...  
Please tell me if 'Coldwell Banker' is a font ... and what is the name of the font used for Bienes Raices?

Many thanks,  
LinK

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120913060120im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cb2_6097.gif)
author: link

comments.content:
I think "Coldwell" is not a font, although it seems to me to be inspired by Handel Gothic and Motter Tektura.

BIENES RAICES is a [ITC Berkeley Oldstyle](http://web.archive.org/web/20120913060120/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-berkeley-old-style/itc-berkeley-oldstyle-medium/). Another plausible match is [Californian](http://web.archive.org/web/20120913060120/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/lanston/ltc-californian/).
Buro Destruct did bring out a font inspired by the Coldwell logo called... [BD Bankwell!](http://web.archive.org/web/20120913060120/http:/www.identifont.com/show?ITM)
